Jussi Bjorling (1911-1960) : Arguably the finest tenor of the twentieth century.  More info here - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jussi_BjÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶rling

This five CD boxset contains a large selection of good recordings.  There is almost no overlap with either the other two CDs that I have uploaded (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5380083 and https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5344956) or "Jussis BÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤sta" (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3950279) uploaded by someone else (the same work may be being performed, but the recordings are different - sometimes greatly so).

You will find a lot of good music on these CDs, if the tenor voice is your sort of thing :)
